description: This file is a detailed test script written in Bash for managing OCI containers. It includes functions for starting containers from bundles or specs, stopping, listing, querying info and state, pausing, resuming, and executing commands within containers. The script provides an interactive command-line interface to perform various container operations via curl-based RPC calls to a server endpoint.

methods.name: start_container_from_bundle
methods.description: Starts a container from an OCI bundle located at a specified path or bundle name in the './TestBundles/' directory, extracting tarballs if necessary.

methods.name: start_container_from_spec
methods.description: Starts a container using a Dobby specification file in the './DobbySpecs/' directory.

methods.name: stop_container
methods.description: Stops a running container given its ID.

methods.name: get_container_info
methods.description: Retrieves information about a specified container.

methods.name: get_container_state
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of a specified container.

methods.name: execute_command
methods.description: Executes a command inside a specified container, handling options and command parsing.

methods.name: ocicontainer_help
methods.description: Displays help information for the command-line interface.
